author: scottbw
msg: Added an admin web interface for granting and revoking Widget Access Request Policies and linked it to the main admin page. Functionality is implemented with a web API rather than built directly into an admin servlet to enable development of remote admin client tools. See WOOKIE-85 and WOOKIE-122 for more information.

author: scottbw
msg: Cleaned up the functional tests using a single set of constants to make it easier to configure the tests to run on different servers, ports etc.

author: rwatler
msg: correct transaction processing for portal administration registration and DB page manager proxy SecurityException propagation
